controls.nist

Class NISTElementFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • controls.nist.NISTElementFactory

  • public class NISTElementFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The NIST Element Factory creates the Magic Draw classes from the NIST SP 800-53 and 800-53a Revision 4 standards data classes.
    Author:
    Sean C. Hubbell

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NISTElementFactory(MDElementFactory factory, java.lang.Package controlsFolder)
      Creates an instance of the NIST Element Factory to be able to generate NIST elements.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createControl(java.lang.Package enumsFolder, Stereotype controlStereotype, Stereotype baselineImpactStereotype, Stereotype statementStereotype, Stereotype supplementalGuidanceStereotype, Stereotype controlEnhancementStereotype, Stereotype referenceStereotype, Stereotype withdrawnStereotype, Stereotype objectiveStereotype, Stereotype potentialAssessmentStereotype, Control control)
      Creates the NIST control from the given control

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • NISTElementFactory

        public NISTElementFactory(MDElementFactory factory,
                          java.lang.Package controlsFolder)
        Creates an instance of the NIST Element Factory to be able to generate NIST elements.
        Parameters:
        factory - the Magic Draw factory used to create Magic Draw specific elements.
        controlsFolder - the Magic Draw package used to start the search for controls from.

    • Method Detail

      • createControl

        public void createControl(java.lang.Package enumsFolder,
                          Stereotype controlStereotype,
                          Stereotype baselineImpactStereotype,
                          Stereotype statementStereotype,
                          Stereotype supplementalGuidanceStereotype,
                          Stereotype controlEnhancementStereotype,
                          Stereotype referenceStereotype,
                          Stereotype withdrawnStereotype,
                          Stereotype objectiveStereotype,
                          Stereotype potentialAssessmentStereotype,
                          Control control)
        Creates the NIST control from the given control
        Parameters:
        enumsFolder - the folder containing the reusable enumerations
        controlStereotype - the control stereotype to be applied to each control created
        baselineImpactStereotype - the baseline impact stereotype to be applied to each baseline impact created.
        statementStereotype - the statement stereotype to be applied to each statement created.
        supplementalGuidanceStereotype - the supplemental guidance stereotype to be applied to each supplemental guidance created.
        controlEnhancementStereotype - the control enhancement stereotype to be applied to each control enhancement created.
        referenceStereotype - the reference stereotype to be applied to each reference created.
        withdrawnStereotype - the withdrawn stereotype to be applied to each withdrawn created.
        objectiveStereotype - the objective stereotype to be applied to each objective created.
        potentialAssessmentStereotype - the potential assessment stereotype to be applied to each potential assessment created
        control - the control that contains the datafrom the standard.
